Technique: FORMED BY HAND; PAINTED; ENGRAVED; FAYENCE
Name: Necklace of amulets and beads
Description: This necklace is composed of beads of molten glass and  faience amulets. The latter represent several divinities like Anubis, Bastet, Bes, Shu, Taweret and the udjat-eyes. The piece which probably dates from the 3rd Intermediate Period comes from a tomb of Tell el-Yahudiya.
